Name: MentalEdge.BetterTeamBalance
Description: Team balancing and shuffling, done smortly.

ConVars.Name: btb_tone
ConVars.HelpString: Whether BTB should use the tone API to get player stats so it can have an idea of how good someone is right off the bat.

ConVars.Name: btb_tone_url
ConVars.HelpString: URL of tone API to use.

ConVars.Name: btb_party
ConVars.HelpString: Enable player formed parties. This feature requires FSU.

ConVars.Name: btb_party_highlight
ConVars.HelpString: Enable party highlighting, allowing party members to more easily recognize each other through walls.

ConVars.Name: btb_nemesis
ConVars.HelpString: Enable player selected nemeses. This feature requires FSU.

ConVars.Name: btb_recent_balancing
ConVars.HelpString: Allow BTB to change the team of a player, until they have been on the server for a minute. This allows BTB to adjust the teams a bit, as players join. This aims to result in better teams in the first game on a server, or a game where the playercount increases a lot. To really work well, the tone API should be enabled as well.

ConVars.Name: btb_difference_max
ConVars.HelpString: The allowed difference between teams, above which a player will be moved over. Set to zero to disable team size auto-balancing.

ConVars.Name: btb_wait_time
ConVars.HelpString: Duration to wait in multiples of ten seconds for new players to join the deficient team before balancing by moving players over. Set to zero to autobalance immediately. The wait is halved by every additional player of difference between the teams.

ConVars.Name: btb_shuffle
ConVars.HelpString: Set to one to enable team shuffle between matches.

ConVars.Name: btb_grace_time
ConVars.HelpString: Duration in multiples of 10 seconds. Length of the grace period at the start of a match where further on-the-fly team changes are still allowed, if teamcomp changes due to leaving/joining players occur after initial shuffle.

ConVars.Name: btb_suggestion_limit
ConVars.HelpString: The relative score difference treshold, if the scores stay above this difference, a rebalance will eventually be suggested in chat. Set to zero to disable the suggestion message. This feature requires FSU.

ConVars.Name: btb_stomp_limit
ConVars.HelpString: The relative score difference above which the teams will eventually be automatically balanced even without approval by vote. Provided the imbalance persists/grows over some time and the match seems to be snowballing. Set to zero to disable forced rebalance.

ConVars.Name: btb_active_limit
ConVars.HelpString: Insidious/Active balance treshold. Above this score difference, the teams will be balanced by swapping two suitable players between them at a time. (A strong player to the losing side, a weak one to the winning side.) Set to zero to disable. Only occurs if there is an actual team strength difference, will not interfere with evenly matched teams even if one is winning.

ConVars.Name: btb_vote_fraction
ConVars.HelpString: Fraction of players needed to vote for a rebalance. This feature requires FSU.

ConVars.Name: btb_vote_duration
ConVars.HelpString: Duration of the vote to balance teams, in seconds. This feature requires FSU.

ConVars.Name: btb_afk_threshold
ConVars.HelpString: Number of players needed on the server for it to start kicking afk players, below this playercount, afk players will be ignored. Set to zero to disable AFK kicking.

ConVars.Name: btb_afk_time
ConVars.HelpString: The amount of time in seconds a player can be afk before getting kicked. They will get a chat message and RUI pop-up warning at half of this.

ConVars.Name: uid_list
ConVars.HelpString: Used to save player details between matches. Leave as is.

ConVars.Name: rank_list
ConVars.HelpString: Used to save player details between matches. Leave as is.

ConVars.Name: party_list
ConVars.HelpString: Used to save player details between matches. Leave as is.

ConVars.Name: nemesis_list
ConVars.HelpString: Used to save player details between matches. Leave as is.
